paper_abstract: A novel microstrip filter based on transverse electromagnetic (TEM)-substrate integrated waveguide (SIW) cavities is firstly proposed in this letter. Compared to the traditional SIW cavities, the TEM-SIW cavities have more compact size and higher Q value. Then, two bandpass filter adopting TEM-SIW cavities is designed and one of it is fabricated. Both simulated and measured results are presented. (c) 2012 Wiley Periodicals, Inc. Int J RF and Microwave CAE, 2012.
paper_title: A novel bandpass filter based on TEM-SIW cavity
